entries.impact: Users can now see faster response times as the changelog cache is stored locally.
entries.title: Save the cache to local perm
entries.whats_new: The application now saves the changelog cache locally to improve performance and reliability.

entries.impact: This helps prevent overload and improves application performance for users.
entries.title: Add some limit on entries
entries.whats_new: A limit has been added to restrict the number of changelog entries displayed or stored.

entries.impact: Ensures consistent performance and faster access to changelog data.
entries.title: Keep the local generate cache strategy
entries.whats_new: Continued use of the strategy to generate changelog cache locally.

entries.impact: Users can see the latest changelog entries for today's date.
entries.title: Update changelog 2025-04-23
entries.whats_new: Changelog information was updated for the date 2025-04-23.

entries.impact: Improves the core functionality of the application.
entries.title: Update main.py
entries.whats_new: The main Python script was updated, potentially adding new features or fixes.

entries.impact: Ensures the application runs with the latest required packages.
entries.title: Update requirements.txt
entries.whats_new: Dependency list updated to include necessary libraries.

entries.impact: Enables automated deployment and updates when code is pushed or changes are made.
entries.title: Interact with Railway and Github webhook
entries.whats_new: Added integration with Railway deployment platform and Github webhook support.

entries.impact: Users can now access the application via the Railway hosted URL.
entries.title: Deploy on Railway Ready
entries.whats_new: Application deployed on Railway hosting platform, ready for use.

entries.impact: Deployment process has been tested and verified.
entries.title: Merge pull request #2 from AkikozZM/DeployTest
entries.whats_new: Test deployment changes via pull request #2.

entries.impact: Back-end services are now accessible for frontend integration.
entries.title: Back-end api deploy on Railway Success
entries.whats_new: Back-end API successfully deployed and operational on Railway.

entries.impact: This is a breaking change because the API is now publicly accessible, which may impact security and data privacy. Users should be aware of potential exposure of endpoints.
entries.title: Open Back-end API to other users
entries.whats_new: The API is now accessible to external users outside the internal network.

entries.impact: Simplifies interface management for developers.
entries.title: Collect interface to src\types.ts
entries.whats_new: All interface definitions were consolidated into a single file for easier management.

entries.impact: Provides a better visual experience for users.
entries.title: Polish Front-end Page
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the front-end home page with decorations, loading effects, and code cleanup.

entries.impact: This is a breaking change because clicking an entry now navigates to a dedicated detail view, altering previous behavior.
entries.title: Add more details on the Detail.tsx
entries.whats_new: Improved the changelog detail page by adding a floating navbar and more detailed information.

entries.impact: The API now generates a JSON file for cache, changing how data is retrieved and displayed, which could affect existing frontend code.
entries.title: Use json cache strategy to connect front-end and back-end
entries.whats_new: Implemented a caching strategy where the backend generates a JSON cache file that the front-end loads.

entries.impact: Improves user navigation experience.
entries.title: Polish the Sidebar component. Basic layout of ChangelogOverview page
entries.whats_new: Enhanced the sidebar layout for better navigation.

entries.impact: Eases maintenance and improves code organization.
entries.title: Optimize constants to constants/index.tsx file
entries.whats_new: Refactored constant definitions into a dedicated file.

entries.impact: This is a breaking change because it introduces a new user interface for navigation, replacing previous layouts.
entries.title: Front-end layout implementation
entries.whats_new: Built the sidebar and basic layout for browsing features like Home, Chat, Changelog.

entries.impact: This is a breaking change as it introduces a GUI that displays changelogs, replacing command-line or static methods.
entries.title: Basic front-end web implementation
entries.whats_new: Implemented a front-end web interface for viewing GitHub changelogs with automatic content generation.

entries.impact: Breaks previous assumptions about commit analysis, now supports auto identify breaking changes.
entries.title: Update the llm and schemas
entries.whats_new: Updated language model and schema files to support auto-detection of breaking changes.

entries.impact: Improves analysis accuracy by avoiding cached data.
entries.title: Second version of LLM, delete cache
entries.whats_new: A new version of the language model was implemented, and the cache was removed to support dynamic analysis.

entries.impact: Prevents unnecessary or sensitive files from being committed.
entries.title: update git ignore
entries.whats_new: Updated .gitignore to exclude new generated files and sensitive data.

entries.impact: Lays the groundwork for backend functionality.
entries.title: basic back-end api implemented
entries.whats_new: A foundational backend API was created.

entries.impact: Sets up the project environment for subsequent development.

entries.whats_new: Project initialization completed with initial files and setup.
